scenario_text.value:
Hey, Takuma! You got a sec? There’s something
real important I want to ask you.
It’s about that thing from the other day.
Huh? What thing? What are you talking about?

You know! From when we met up in the gym!
When I was practicing catch phrases?
Oh, right. What’s up?

Listen, you didn’t say anything about that to
anyone, did you?

(Minoru seems kind of upset. Does he suspect
that I did?)
Of course not! Why do you ask?

Saki seems like she knows something. She gets
this grin whenever she looks at me.

Look, Takuma, tell it to me straight, did you
say something?
What should I say?
Yes.
No.
Maybe.
Yeah, I did say something.
Are you serious?
Nah, just kidding. I didn’t say a word.
Oh, come on! Which is it?

Sorry, I lied. I just wanted to see how you’d
react.

So which was the lie? I can’t even keep track
anymore!

Either way, remember, heroes have to be
perfect.
So nobody can know about how I practice.

You get it, right, Takuma? It’s part of being
a man!

So, you really were trying to come up with
a catch phrase?

No, I didn’t say anything. After all,
I promised you, didn’t I?
Really? You mean that? Hmm?

Gah, Minoru, don’t get so close! Quit staring
into my eyes like that!

Yeah, you’re right. You wouldn’t say
anything. I’m sorry I doubted you.
What convinced you?

Heh...Didn’t you know? I can tell when people
are lying. Heheh.

I just need to look them in the eyes like
this. It’s like another superpower.
(He’s...kidding, right?)
I don’t know. Maybe I did, or maybe I didn’t.
Hey! Don’t you brush this off like that!

Look, whether you said something or not,
I just want you to know something.
I’m kind of serious about this, okay?
Like how serious?

It’s not just about me looking cool, all
right? No, really.

If it helps encourage even one of us, don’t
you think that’s useful?

Hey, I get what you’re trying to say, but...
do you really mean that?
Have a little faith in me, would you? Jeeze.

I mean, I can’t lie, I do want to look cool,
but...

Look, just forget it, okay? The important
thing is you keep it secret from the others.

I’ll go make sure Saki doesn’t say anything
either!
